subject: Hi, how are you?
body:
Hi, how are you? 
Please can i talk to you? 
My uncles are fighting me and my younger brother because of the inheritance our late father left for us..
Our late father left houses and he deposited 45 kilograms of gold in a security storage company ofr us and my name was used as next of kin. 
We need someone who is capable of helping us transfer it out of Ghana and make arrangements to sell it so that me and my brother can start a new life with it. 
If you are ready to help us please indicate and i will send you all the details.
please write back to me asap.

subject: Re:   Hi, how are you?
body:
Hello there,

I'm sorry to hear about the situation you and your brother are currently facing. It must be really tough for both of you. I'd like to know more about this situation. How did it come to this point? And why is it necessary to transfer the gold out of Ghana? 

Please note that while I'm interested in hearing more about your story, I won't be able to provide any personal information or financial assistance. However, I can certainly offer a listening ear and perhaps some general advice.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
June

subject: Re: Hi, how are you?
body:
Sir thank you for your concern.
i really appreciate it. The thing is that my late father was a Muslim and
he was the chief of the community. He married a Christian (my mother)
against the wish of his kinsmen, they calls my mom an infidel and they
never accepted her as the queen of our community.

But my dad loved my mother very much and he stood his ground trying to
prove his love for her. My mom suddenly developed a terrible illness and my
father did all that he could do, both medically and otherwise to save her
but she didn't make it.

My mom died in in June 2020 during the covid19.  While my father died in
2023. After his burial his brothers gathered and told me that they have
given my hands in marriage to one alhaji, the alhaji man is even older than
my dad and it was done by force.

I was told its tradition and that i don't have any right to protest.
My younger brother was advised to drop out of school and go to the city and
learn mechanic job.

They seized our cocoa farmland and in the same farmland was a gold
concession mining site. They brought in some Chinese company to start
mining the land.

I ran to the city with my brother and we are currently staying with one
woman who sells fruits. We are hiding here because we don't want any of my
fathers people to know we are here.

Inside my fathers brief case that's where i got the certificate of deposit
of the gold in a security company and another certificate of deposit where
he bought some coca cola stock shares. i want to first of all get the gold
and sell it but we don't have what it takes to do. that and also we are
careful not to let my uncles to know about it.

We have been to the security company and we requested to see the manager
and he confirmed that everything is intact.

So please go ahead and tell me what to do in order to get the gold out and
sell it.

thank you. waiting for your reply.

subject: Re: Hi, how are you?
body:
Hello,

I'm really sorry to hear about your situation. It sounds like you're going through a tough time. I can't imagine how difficult it must be for you and your brother.

Regarding the gold, it's great that you have the deposit certificate. That's a good start. However, I'm not an expert in this field, so I would suggest seeking professional advice. Maybe you could find a lawyer or someone who specializes in these matters? They might be able to guide you on the best course of action.

Also, have you considered reaching out to any local organizations or charities that might be able to help? They might provide some support or resources that could assist you during this challenging time.

Remember, it's important to stay safe and protect your interests. Please don't rush into anything without fully understanding the implications.

I hope things get better for you soon.

Best wishes,
June

subject: Re: Hi, how are you?
body:
thanks for the fatherly advice.
my fear is getting into wrong hands
can you help me get some one over there who can be interested to help
sponsor us in filling the release of the gold out of the security company.
Here there are a lot of people that likes to steal people gold and
sometimes they can even kill. so i prefer some one from outside so that
when the gold is released and transferred out of here i will come over
there and meet with the person. Then we can share the proceeds 70/30. This
will be 70% for us and 30% for the sponsor

subject: Re: Hi, how are you?
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your situation with me. It sounds like you're in a bit of a tough spot, and I can understand why you'd be looking for help from outside.

However, I'm curious about the process of releasing the gold from the security company. Could you explain more about how that works? And what kind of sponsorship are you looking for exactly?

I'm also wondering about the risks involved. You mentioned people stealing gold and even killing sometimes - that sounds very dangerous! How do we ensure safety throughout this process?

Looking forward to hearing more details from you.

Best wishes,
June

subject: Re: Hi, how are you?
body:
I just called the security company and got vital information and from what
I heard the process is not too hard.

As the next of kin the process will be easy. I will be required to come
with the copy of the certificate of deposit issued to my dad and they will
also require my presence to sign the release papers with a fee of $850 or
it equivalent in the Ghanaian cedis.

When it is signed they will use their company car to transfer the gold to
any of my choice refinery or bank  if i decide to sell or keep the gold
here. but if i choose to sell or send it outside of Ghana, they will assist
in shipping it to the country of my choice.

If i choose to use another shipping agency they will release it to them
after agreement. this is the information I got when I called their office
now but I will go there on Monday to meet their manager for more
comprehensive details.

what do you think?

subject: GOOD EVENING
body:
Can I give you the contact of the security company so that you can contact
them directly and find out all the details that are necessary for getting
the gold released legally without any problems so that they can explain
better to you.

i will also go there on Monday to see the manager if you want me to do so.
thank you

subject: Re: GOOD EVENING
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your willingness to help me get in touch with the security company. It would be great if you could provide their contact details so I can reach out to them directly.

Also, it's very kind of you to offer to meet with the manager on my behalf. However, I think it would be best if I handle this matter personally. 

Could you please tell me more about what I should expect when dealing with the security company? Are there any specific questions that you recommend I ask them?

Thanks again for your assistance!

Best wishes,
June

subject: Re: Hi, how are you?
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like a straightforward process, and it's great that the security company is willing to assist in such a manner. 

I'm curious though, have you considered what you'll do with the gold once it's released? Selling or keeping it both seem like viable options. Also, if you choose to ship it outside of Ghana, do you already have a country in mind?

Looking forward to hearing more about your plans on Monday after your meeting with the manager.

Best wishes,
June

subject: Re: Hi, how are you?
body:
Let me try and answer most of the questions you asked. The country i want
to live with my brother is either USA, CANADA,UK OR EUROPE. I need a
peaceful country where i and my brother can live peacefully and continue
his education.

I don't know how much it will cost to finance the shipping of the gold
abroad honestly but i will ask the manager tomorrow when I get to the
company.

I will never disclose this information again to anyone i promise you.

As my fathers next of kin the company will have no issue releasing what is
mine. I think they will need my presence before anything could be done.

subject: Re: GOOD EVENING
body:
good morning sir.
how are you doing this morning? as for me I am fine. i have noted down all
the things you requested. i will ask the manager tomorrow once i get there.
below is the company details

Company Name:
EH SECURITY COMPANY

Address:  P.O.BOX 123, MILE 7, NEW ACHIMOTA ACCRA GHANA.

Managers name:
MR. DAVID SMITH
Telephone number:
+233 242118152
Email address:
dbsmith.m@gmail.com

subject: Re: Hi, how are you?
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like you and your brother are looking for a fresh start in a peaceful country, which is completely understandable. The USA and Europe both have great educational opportunities.

Regarding the shipping of gold, it's wise to consult with the manager to get an accurate estimate of the cost. It's always good to be well-informed about these matters.

You mentioned that as your father's next of kin, the company will release what is yours. That seems logical, but have you considered seeking legal advice just to make sure everything goes smoothly? 

Remember, it's important not to share sensitive information with anyone you don't trust. I'm glad you're being cautious about this.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
June

subject: Good morning sir
body:
I am getting ready to leave the house now and go to the company.
its 8:43am here now. i don't know what time it is where you are now. Once i
am done with the manager I will let you know.
Please tell me a little about yourself and is your name June?

subject: Re: Good morning sir
body:
Hello there! 

I hope you're having a good day. It's interesting to hear about your plans, sounds like you have a busy schedule ahead. As for me, I'm just an ordinary person who enjoys simple things in life. I love reading books and taking long walks in the park. And no, my name isn't June. 

May I ask what kind of company you're going to? What do you do there?

Best wishes,
June

subject: Re: Good morning sir
body:
good afternoon sir.
i met with the manager and he asked me some questions about my father and
why i want the gold transfered out of Ghana. He also asked who the
individual i was talking to is and whats my arrangements. finally he said
that for me to be on a safe side and for me to get the gold as my fathers
next of kin i will need a lawyer.

i told him i don't have any lawyer and I can't afford any lawyer now
he gave me called one lawyer anf introduce me to him on the phone and asked
me to go see him.

i took a taxi to the lawyers office and he asked me many times and promised
to help. he also asked what's my relationship with the person abroad and i
couldn't give him a satisfaction answer. so he said i should send your
telephone number to him and email. i told him I will get back to him then i
left.

this is what I did today.
i have spent all the little money i had on me today for transportation and
the sun is too hot here0

subject: Re: Good morning sir
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing your day with me. It sounds like you've had quite an eventful time. I'm sorry to hear about the difficulties you're facing, especially with the hot sun and running out of money.

It's interesting that the manager suggested getting a lawyer involved. Did he explain why this was necessary? And how did you feel when he introduced you to the lawyer over the phone?

Also, I'm curious about what kind of questions the lawyer asked you. You mentioned he wanted to know your relationship with the person abroad - is there a specific reason for this?

Remember, it's important not to share any personal contact information such as telephone numbers or email addresses without being sure of who is asking and why they need it.

Looking forward to hearing more from you soon!

Best wishes,
June

subject: HELLO SIR
body: HELLO SIR, PLEASE WHERE ARE YOU

subject: Re: Good morning sir
body:
Please who are you? in your words you have adviced me countless times to be
careful with whom i share personal details with. i am careful now. so tell
me who you are?

subject: Re: Good morning sir
body:

body:
Thanks for the time and advices.
I appreciate it. at the moment what i need is a helper. some one that can
help me get the gold out and we make agreement. if you have anyone to refer
to me that will be good for me. if none no problem.
i have to continue looking for someone

subject: Re: HELLO SIR
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your situation with me. It sounds like you're in need of some assistance with a gold-related matter. I'm curious to know more about it, if you don't mind sharing. What exactly is the nature of this task? And how did you come across this gold?

I'm afraid I can't personally assist or refer anyone at the moment, but I'd be happy to offer advice or suggestions based on the information you provide. Please remember not to share any sensitive personal details though.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best wishes,
June

body:
